Class ConcManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ConcManager

  • public class ConcManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Concordance Manager class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConcManager(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> HashTable)
      Constructor for ConcManager Sets HashTable equal to the parameter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> adjacentQuery(java.lang.String firstWord, java.lang.String secondWord)
      Overloaded method for two word adjacency query Method to return a list of line numbers on which the two words are adjacent on The words can appear in any order as long as they are adjacent
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> adjacentQuery(java.lang.String firstWord, java.lang.String secondWord, java.lang.String thirdWord)
      Overloaded method for three word adjacency query Method to return a list of line numbers on which the three words are adjacent on The three words can appear in any order as long as they are adjacent to one another
      java.lang.Integer appearQuery(java.lang.String word)
      Method to return the number of occurrences of the given word
      java.lang.String[] distanceQuery(java.lang.String word, java.lang.Integer distance, java.lang.Integer lineNumber)
      Method to return a list of words that are within a given distance of the target word The target word is specified by a string value and a specific line number that the word appears on
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> lineListQuery(java.lang.String word)
      Method to return a list of line numbers on which the given word appears on If the given word appears on the same line twice, then only one occurrence appears in the list
      java.lang.Integer numLineListQuery(java.lang.String word)
      Method to return the number of lines on which the given word appears on If the given word appears on the same line twice, then the line is only counted a single time
      java.lang.Integer rankQuery(java.lang.String word)
      Method to return the rank (based on occurrences) of the given word with respect other word in the concordance Uses getRank() from Word Object Ranking starts at 1, with the word that has the highest number of occurrences

    • Method Detail

      • lineListQuery

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> lineListQuery(java.lang.String word)
        Method to return a list of line numbers on which the given word appears on If the given word appears on the same line twice, then only one occurrence appears in the list
        Parameters:
        word - The word being queried
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of exact size with line numbers appearing in ascending order

      • numLineListQuery

        public java.lang.Integer numLineListQuery(java.lang.String word)
        Method to return the number of lines on which the given word appears on If the given word appears on the same line twice, then the line is only counted a single time
        Parameters:
        word - The word being queried
        Returns:
        an integer value for the number of lines

      • appearQuery

        public java.lang.Integer appearQuery(java.lang.String word)
        Method to return the number of occurrences of the given word
        Parameters:
        word - The word being queried
        Returns:
        an integer value for the number of occurrences of the word

      • rankQuery

        public java.lang.Integer rankQuery(java.lang.String word)
        Method to return the rank (based on occurrences) of the given word with respect other word in the concordance Uses getRank() from Word Object Ranking starts at 1, with the word that has the highest number of occurrences
        Parameters:
        word - The word being queried
        Returns:

      • distanceQuery

        public java.lang.String[] distanceQuery(java.lang.String word,
                                        java.lang.Integer distance,
                                        java.lang.Integer lineNumber)
        Method to return a list of words that are within a given distance of the target word The target word is specified by a string value and a specific line number that the word appears on
        Parameters:
        word - The word being queried
        distance - The distance from the target word (exclusive) in both directions
        lineNumber - The line number that the target word appears on, if the target word appears multiple times on the line, then only the first occurrence is used as the target word
        Returns:
        Returns a String[] of the words found within the distance of the target word The words appears as they would in the text, with the target word always in the middle of the array

      • adjacentQuery

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> adjacentQuery(java.lang.String firstWord,
                                                            java.lang.String secondWord)
        Overloaded method for two word adjacency query Method to return a list of line numbers on which the two words are adjacent on The words can appear in any order as long as they are adjacent
        Parameters:
        firstWord -
        secondWord -
        Returns:
        ArrayList an array of line numbers

      • adjacentQuery

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> adjacentQuery(java.lang.String firstWord,
                                                            java.lang.String secondWord,
                                                            java.lang.String thirdWord)
        Overloaded method for three word adjacency query Method to return a list of line numbers on which the three words are adjacent on The three words can appear in any order as long as they are adjacent to one another
        Parameters:
        firstWord -
        secondWord -
        Returns:
        ArrayList an array of line numbers
